mdRecord.dcterms:title: Document, Society of the Cincinnati certificate for James Williams of Virginia, 1787 March 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Society of the Cincinnati
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Engraved Society of the Cincinnati certificate for James William, Esquire of Virginia. As president of the Society, George Washington signs the document at Mount Vernon on March 1, 1787. The document is also signed by secretary Henry Knox. Certificate is mounted to a board and has some staining and a tear.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Society of the Cincinnati -- Membership
